mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYS_SHEDLOCK_JOB( APPLICATION, NAME, HOST_IP, LOCKED_AT, LOCK_UNTIL, LOCKED_BY, STATE, DATA, LABEL, UPDATE_TIME ) values ( #{application}, #{name}, #{host_ip}, #{locked_at}, #{lock_until}, #{locked_by}, #{state}, #{data}, #{label}, #{update_time} )

INSERT INTO SYS_SHEDLOCK_JOB( APPLICATION, `name`, HOST_IP, LOCKED_AT, LOCK_UNTIL, LOCKED_BY, STATE, DATA, LABEL, UPDATE_TIME ) values ( #{application}, #{name}, #{host_ip}, #{locked_at}, #{lock_until}, #{locked_by}, #{state}, #{data}, #{label}, #{update_time} )

( #{i.application}, #{i.name}, #{i.host_ip}, #{i.locked_at}, #{i.lock_until}, #{i.locked_by}, #{i.state}, #{i.data}, #{i.label}, #{i.update_time} )

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SYS_SHEDLOCK_JOB WHERE APPLICATION=#{application} AND NAME=#{name}
